name: Naxos
description:
Naxos is like all of my other games!

I just feel like there arent many Auto Battle RPGS out there....

I really want to keep moving the genre forward!



Okay why not try even more different formulas??

This time I decided to not use big menus ==( Many houses)

I tried compacting everything in the game in 3 houses!

I also feel like the game is better to learn... By making things small...



Features:
  • Craft equipment
  • Almost Endless Grind***
  • Academy(Abbilites to learn)
  • 10 Different Scenarios
  • 10 Unique Enemies
  • Automatic Progression
  • Mining!
